mean_cn: n. 分公司，附属机构；  vt. 使隶属于，接纳，追溯；  vi. 发生联系
mean_en: a person, organization, or establishment associated with another as a subordinate, subsidiary, or member
word_etyma: af一再 + fil子女 + iate表动词→affiliate分公司，附属机构
sentence: This company has established many affiliates over the years.
sentence_trans: 这个集团这几年建立了许多分公司。
